#USER# #USER# Humans are barbarians. It’s 2021 and we still eat meat today, same as in the old ages. We’ve not progressed at all. In addition climate change will become major issue in just 1-2 decades. We’ve done well. #HASHTAG#
#USER# He is 72 and was born in South Africa. So, he is not British by birth himself. I’d leave him alone, he’ll soon retire. I’d not give him any air time, #USER#
#USER# #USER# I don’t think I’ve said that. But, after his actions his trust is questionable. I’m saying I don’t trust him. People can of course believe in whatever they want.

#USER# Last time we’ve had a power cut we’ve had a family book club, ordered takeaway & had an open fire going. I’m sure companies have people on standby fixing faults. They always give worst case scenario, power should be back sooner than that.

#USER# #USER# People have been brainwashed with Covid. Pharma and research companies are continuously bringing new variants, as want to continue making billions from it. Some people will miss decades of normal life, as a result. Not very smart, if you ask me.

#USER# #USER# #USER# Just for #USER# information, this Twitter member calls SNP a nationalist cult. May I remind you that you are in Scotland. If you don’t like Scotland, you can always leave. If I’m Scottish, there is only party I’d support and that’s #USER# .

#USER# No, merely indirectly demonstrating Government is the Police, they own the Police, therefore can break as many laws they can, but won’t be investigated for it. The deeper you think about it, the more you realise just how vile this is.

Scotland has to separate, and once independent apply for the EU membership. It would be doing better than England then.

#USER# But, surely as a Chairman you provide strategic guidance on matters including advice on governance standards. If your editor posts defamatory articles which prove to be inaccurate, the responsibility for it goes to the top. You may not be deemed innocent.

#USER# Look after yourself. My Mum had it, she fought it well. Lots of homemade hot soups & fresh ginger tea with lemon and honey really helped. Also make sure you open the window to get some fresh air into your lungs. Essential oils and using diffuser also helps.

#USER# He’s effectively trolling the public and saying to all of us he’s untouchable!
#USER# People deserve to know what our PM is doing about it? We’ve had good news on the US trade deal. Please pass our thanks to Johnson for working hard for our country. #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# #USER# People should not take things literally, as not very sharp. This is his indirect answer to the recent accusations. Police is part of the Government, in the role as a PM he’s ultimate Government official, he can do whatever he likes and won’t be investigated. He’s trolling us.
#USER# #USER# It would appear that Royal Family and current Government are the two peas in the pod!

#USER# #USER# Apart from being inaccurate it’s not very well thought out comment, the underlying message being that Labour isn’t patriotic. Tories embraced little Britain whilst doing flag waving at the same time. How patriotic of you to do that, Nadine. #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# I’m very scared. #HASHTAG# Perhaps people should not lie in the first place to get the job. The issue is already monitored with the team and the HR, we are following all right steps, if someone can’t do the job they are paid to do, then it’s clear what needs to be done.

#USER# You’re speaking out 2 years too late. When Johnson tried to prorogue Parliament, he should have been sacked & escorted from the 10 Downing Street. Current level of corruption is colossal. Associated power & money, as a result, won’t be easy to eradicate. Just saying..
#USER# #USER# #USER# PM’s ambitions? So, lies and corruption is an ambition now? Good to know. #HASHTAG# Let’s all follow same suit.

#USER# #USER# #USER# You two are the 2 smart peas in the pod. #HASHTAG# Muted nicely.

#USER# #USER# #USER# Why do you need to be an economist to understand the concept of free ports? 🤔 The name indicates what free ports are all about, due to lack of regulation it's an ideal hub for money laundering and tax evasion. You clearly have a good business acumen. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# They’ve let down hundreds of people who they are suppose to serve whilst they protect those carrying out corruption. I do hope new Government carries out needed reshuffle, as needed urgently.

#USER# #USER# Thousands of people with the weak immune system used to die from common flu, that was never escalated by media, yet each patient dying with Covid is. That’s only because it’s still relatively new. In 5 years time we won’t talk about it.
